imagePullSecrets.description: Global Docker registry secret names as an array

commonLabels.description: Labels to add to all deployed objects

commonAnnotations.description: Annotations to add to all deployed objects

extraDeploy.description: Array of extra objects to deploy with the release

enabled.description: Enable diagnostic mode (all probes will be disabled and the command will be overridden)

command.description: Command to override all containers in the deployment

args.description: Args to override all containers in the deployment

tag.description: Appsmith image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

digest.description: Appsmith image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

replicaCount.description: Number of Appsmith client replicas to deploy

enabled.description: Enable livenessProbe on Appsmith client containers
Enable readinessProbe on Appsmith client containers
Enable startupProbe on Appsmith client containers

customLivenessProbe.description: Custom livenessProbe that overrides the default one

customReadinessProbe.description: Custom readinessProbe that overrides the default one

customStartupProbe.description: Custom startupProbe that overrides the default one

limits.description: The resources limits for the Appsmith client containers

requests.description: The requested resources for the Appsmith client containers

enabled.description: Enabled Appsmith client pods' Security Context

fsGroup.description: Set Appsmith client pod's Security Context fsGroup

enabled.description: Enabled Appsmith client containers' Security Context

runAsUser.description: Set Appsmith client containers' Security Context runAsUser

runAsNonRoot.description: Set Appsmith client containers' Security Context runAsNonRoot

readOnlyRootFilesystem.description: Set Appsmith client containers' Security Context runAsNonRoot

command.description: Override default container command (useful when using custom images)

args.description: Override default container args (useful when using custom images)

podLabels.description: Extra labels for Appsmith client pods

podAffinityPreset.description: Pod affinity preset. Ignored if `client.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

podAntiAffinityPreset.description: Pod anti-affinity preset. Ignored if `client.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

type.description: Node affinity preset type. Ignored if `client.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

key.description: Node label key to match. Ignored if `client.affinity` is set

values.description: Node label values to match. Ignored if `client.affinity` is set

affinity.description: Affinity for Appsmith client pods assignment

nodeSelector.description: Node labels for Appsmith client pods assignment

tolerations.description: Tolerations for Appsmith client pods assignment

topologySpreadConstraints.description: Topology Spread Constraints for pod assignment spread across your cluster among failure-domains. Evaluated as a template

schedulerName.description: Name of the k8s scheduler (other than default) for Appsmith client pods

terminationGracePeriodSeconds.description: Seconds Redmine pod needs to terminate gracefully

lifecycleHooks.description: for the Appsmith client container(s) to automate configuration before or after startup

extraEnvVars.description: Array with extra environment variables to add to Appsmith client nodes

extraEnvVarsCM.description: Name of existing ConfigMap containing extra env vars for Appsmith client nodes

extraEnvVarsSecret.description: Name of existing Secret containing extra env vars for Appsmith client nodes

extraVolumes.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional volumes for the Appsmith client pod(s)

extraVolumeMounts.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional volumeMounts for the Appsmith client container(s)

sidecars.description: Add additional sidecar containers to the Appsmith client pod(s)

initContainers.description: Add additional init containers to the Appsmith client pod(s)

loadBalancerIP.description: Appsmith client service Load Balancer IP

loadBalancerSourceRanges.description: Appsmith client service Load Balancer sources

externalTrafficPolicy.description: Appsmith client service external traffic policy

annotations.description: Additional custom annotations for Appsmith client service

extraPorts.description: Extra ports to expose in Appsmith client service (normally used with the `sidecars` value)

sessionAffinity.description: Control where client requests go, to the same pod or round-robin

enabled.description: Enable ingress record generation for Appsmith

apiVersion.description: Force Ingress API version (automatically detected if not set)

hostname.description: Default host for the ingress record

ingressClassName.description: IngressClass that will be be used to implement the Ingress (Kubernetes 1.18+)

path.description: Default path for the ingress record

annotations.description: Additional annotations for the Ingress resource. To enable certificate autogeneration, place here your cert-manager annotations.

tls.description: Enable TLS configuration for the host defined at `client.ingress.hostname` parameter

selfSigned.description: Create a TLS secret for this ingress record using self-signed certificates generated by Helm

extraHosts.description: An array with additional hostname(s) to be covered with the ingress record

extraPaths.description: An array with additional arbitrary paths that may need to be added to the ingress under the main host

extraTls.description: TLS configuration for additional hostname(s) to be covered with this ingress record

extraRules.description: Additional rules to be covered with this ingress record

replicaCount.description: Number of Appsmith backend replicas to deploy

existingSecret.description: Name of a secret containing the admin password, encryption salt and encryption password

existingSecretPasswordKey.description: Key inside the existing secret containing the admin password

existingSecretEncryptionSaltKey.description: Key inside the existing secret containing the encryption salt

existingSecretEncryptionPasswordKey.description: Key inside the existing secret containing the encryption password
